comments.body: We should probably send out a deprecation notice to people and tell them how to migrate.

Sure, there was breaking change announcement sent on Jun, 28th that talked about how consolidateHttpClientResponseBytes will return `Future<TransferableTypedData>` instead of `Future<Uint8List>` together with instructions on how to adapt the code. We could follow-up on explaining that we decided to keep old method, introduce new one instead.
